body: ACK if this passes the gitian build. This was a backward compatibility function for compatibility with old libc, it (including its sanity check) might no longer be needed.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.
